data.title: Good food and great service
data.text: I eat here regularly and their staff is super nice.  Food is typical Subway but even when they are busy they get you in and out quickly.

data.title: The worst subway by far
data.text: This place is disgusting. They have nothing but kids working here and they just make the messiest subs. They are just horrible, after the 3rd time I'm done. Someone needs to come in here and manage this establishment.

data.title: Big FAN
data.text: The only thing that I dont like about Subway, is that they try to skimp on the cheese. They force you to order extra cheese or double cheese.

data.title: Great lunch
data.text: Fast and efficient service.  Fresh ingredients with a variety of breads at a low cost. Always served your way and in a timely manner. Affordable for the entire family and healthy as well as filling

data.title: Subway is what Subway is - location seldom matters
data.text: Subways offer the same product and so most of the time it's a cookie cutter experience from location to location.  There is nothing bad or great about this location.  However, the staff here does seem to be a notch above most.  If you like Subway you will not be disappointed.

data.title: Not all subways are a light
data.text: I stop by here with my grandson he loves subway. When we walked through the door we got a Harley welcome, " Welcome to Subways ". We walked in and ordered. There was a lot of laughter and camaraderie with the people behind the counter. It was actually a lot of fun ordering our food. The service was outstanding, and it made it very pleasurable to eat there. They made my grandson laugh a lot, and that means something to me... I've been to many subways before, but this one stood out in my mind more than the rest. You have to check it out for yourself the kids working there are very entertaining and fun.
